title: Example: Exploring LoT in MLLM with Creative Humor Generation

definitions.Oogiri: Players are required to make surprising and creative humorous responses to the given multimodal information e.g., images, text, or both.

summary: The slide presents an example of the Oogiri game, which involves players making humorous responses to multimodal information. It also lists three types of translation processes: Image&Text to Text (IT2T), Image to Text (I2T), and Text to Text (T2T).
